data.enText: a member of a small group of soldiers who are not part of an official army and who fight against official soldiers, usually to try to change the government
urban guerrillas (= those who fight in towns)
guerrilla war/warfare (= fought by guerrillas on one or both sides)

tr: a member of an irregular armed force that fights a stronger force by sabotage and harassment

value.def: A guerrilla is someone who fights as part of an unofficial army, usually against an official army or police force.

example.ex: The guerrillas threatened to kill their hostages.
example.tran: 这些游击队员威胁要杀死人质。
